items.sentence: I don\'t think that Tom needs to ask for permission.
Was your high school\'s volleyball team a good team?
We aren\'t going to give Tom the money he asked for.
We can\'t be sure that anything has happened to Tom.
I still have things I need to do before I can leave.
I suspect Tom and Mary are both allergic to peanuts.
Our family didn\'t have a dog when I was growing up.
Tom may not be the only one who knows what happened.
Tom may not want to go camping with us next weekend.
Tom might be able to persuade the others to help us.
